pr_title: Use local private credentials (json key file) to refresh GCS access token

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to hardcode the URL here? Maybe we can move it to a static variable.
timeline.author: ChunxuTang

replies.bodyText: Good catch,  will extract it as a constant val
replies.author: beinan

timeline.bodyText: The GCP documentation here (https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/oauth2) recommends creating a signed JWT with the client ID and a private key from the GCP credential. Is this step automatically covered in the Google OAuth libs?
timeline.author: ChunxuTang

replies.bodyText: Good call, I guess not.  I will post another commit or PR to support JWT with a given client ID
replies.author: beinan

timeline.bodyText: Is the synchronized keyword necessary here? Will this function be invoked in a multi-threaded situation?
timeline.author: ChunxuTang

replies.bodyText: Good call.  This interceptor is used by presto-cli and presto-jdbc.  I think presto-jdbc might have some queries running in parallel.  Even for a single query, during the http conversation,  there are still multiple http calls, some of which might be triggered in an asynchronous way.
replies.author: beinan

timeline.bodyText: add one blank line between private static final and private final
timeline.author: zhenxiao

timeline.bodyText: shall we keep hive here? kind of misleading. If the session property is already defined, could we import the string from other class?
timeline.author: zhenxiao

replies.bodyText:
The "hive.gcs.credentials.path" is the key I newly added.   The other 'hive.gcs.oauth' is an existing one, which can be also found in presto-hive.
presto-hive/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/hive/gcs/GcsConfigurationProvider.java
28:    private static final String GCS_OAUTH_KEY = "hive.gcs.oauth";
If we imported the constant "hive.gcs.oauth" from presto-hive,  we might introduce a new dependency from presto-client to presto-hive.  Shall we do that?
I'm just thinking the name of these two keys need to be consistent.
replies.author: beinan

replies.bodyText:
get it. no need to have dependency from presto-hive
keep hive.gcs.credentials.path is fine
replies.author: zhenxiao

timeline.author: zhenxiao
zhenxiao
zhenxiao

timeline.message: Fix transitive dependencies conflict of google oauth libraries
Make QueryRunner support GCS private key handling
Make presto jdbc driver support Google OAuth private key handling
Fix transitive dependencies conflict of google oauth libraries
Add Google OAuth scopes to extra credentials
Add Google OAuth scopes to extra credentials
Add Google OAuth scopes to extra credentials
Add Google OAuth scopes to extra credentials
